dct_title_s: Harmonie ou correspondance du globe auecq la sphere par les pointes, lignes, cercles, &c. qui se descrivent en la surface des globes terrestres et des mappemondes ; pour responder a ceux qui sont imagines dans la sphere coeleste
dct_description_sm: Par le S. Sanson Dâ€™Abbeville Geographe ordre de sa Maiste Avecq Privilege pour Vingt Ans ; Jean Somer Pruthenus Sculpsit.
California shown as an unlabeled island with a flat northern coast. Depicts small islands between California and the North American continent.

Title showing along top of map outside neat line. Includes text within the eastern hemisphere border. Shows simple outlines of the continents with no places names and illustrates meridians and climatic zones.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
